name: Job Record Report
query:
SELECT
    job.name AS "Job Record:Link/Job Record:180",
    cust.customer_name AS "Customer Name::180",
    job.date AS "Date:Date:120",
    job.custom_created_by AS "Created By::150",

    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT si_unsubmitted.name) AS "Unsubmitted Sales Invoices::200",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pi_unsubmitted.name) AS "Unsubmitted Purchase Invoices::200",

    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT si_submitted.name) AS "Submitted Sales Invoices::200",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pi_submitted.name) AS "Submitted Purchase Invoices::200"

FROM `tabJob Record` job

LEFT JOIN `tabCustomer` cust ON cust.name = job.customer

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT name, custom_job_record
    FROM `tabSales Invoice`
    WHERE docstatus != 1
) si_unsubmitted ON si_unsubmitted.custom_job_record = job.name

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT name, custom_job_record
    FROM `tabPurchase Invoice`
    WHERE docstatus != 1
) pi_unsubmitted ON pi_unsubmitted.custom_job_record = job.name

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT name, custom_job_record
    FROM `tabSales Invoice`
    WHERE docstatus = 1
) si_submitted ON si_submitted.custom_job_record = job.name

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT name, custom_job_record
    FROM `tabPurchase Invoice`
    WHERE docstatus = 1
) pi_submitted ON pi_submitted.custom_job_record = job.name

WHERE
    job.docstatus < 2
    AND job.date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND job.job_status NOT IN ('Closed', 'Cancelled')

GROUP BY job.name
